name: KennethJAllenLawGroup
0: ”Alexa, Open Kenneth J Allen Law Group”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kenneth j. allen law group
des:
Kenneth J Allen Law Group is made up of personal injury lawyers serving serving Chicago and NW Indiana, who are experienced and knowledgeable in the details and procedures that can make or break an injury case. The law firm possesses well over 100 years of litigation experience.

Our Northwest Indiana and Chicagoland personal injury law firm is here to help you. Please feel free to contact our offices for a free, initial legal consultation if you or a loved one has been seriously injured or killed due to the actions of another. Kenneth J Allen Law Group is here for you!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
